Class Matrix3

java.lang.Object
raja.Matrix3
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Matrix3 extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a 3x3 matrix for linear transformations in 3D space.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • get

      public double get(int row, int col)
      Provides access to a specific element of the matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-2).
      col - The column index (0-2).
      Returns:
      The matrix element at the specified position.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the row or column index is invalid.

    • multiply

      public Matrix3 multiply(Matrix3 other)
      Multiplies this matrix by another matrix.
      Parameters:
      other - The other Matrix3 to multiply with.
      Returns:
      The resulting Matrix3.

    • transform

      public Vector3D transform(Vector3D vector)
      Transforms a Vector3 by this matrix.
      Parameters:
      vector - The Vector3 to transform.
      Returns:
      The transformed Vector3.

    • determinant

      public double determinant()
      Computes the determinant of this matrix.
      Returns:
      The determinant value.

    • inverse

      public Matrix3 inverse()
      Computes the inverse of this matrix.
      Returns:
      The inverse Matrix3, or null if the matrix is singular (non-invertible).

    • transpose

      public Matrix3 transpose()
      Computes the transpose of this matrix.
      Returns:
      The transposed Matrix3.
